title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 175.28 - Aid for pupils with special educational needs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 175.28 - Aid for pupils with special educational needs

State Regulations

For purposes of adjustments due to differences in tests and
test administration, as provided for in Education Law, section 3602(1)(e), below level four means below the State reference point, as determined by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
175.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
